title: Match Making Block List: Well overdue
body:
I've played since season one (on my main account) and can't believe there isn't a match making block system in place yet. It would easily solve problems like today for instance, where I get a troll AFK jungler. Yes, I reported him both times but that will have no effect as my "dobber" level is ludicrously high (I find myself having to report one player per game almost). 

Just make it so you can only block people you've reported so the system can't be abused. There are numerous players for numerous reasons that I'd happily never play with or against again. Make my queue time longer? I don't care, I play to have a fun competitive game, I can wait the extra time
